subject: Running
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Oscar Pistorius said he will appeal '‘at the highest levels’' if the I.A.A.F. bars him from competing in the Beijing Olympics on grounds that his prosthetics give him an unfair edge.
snippet: Oscar Pistorius said he will appeal '‘at the highest levels’' if the I.A.A.F. bars him from competing in the Beijing Olympics on grounds that his prosthetics give him an unfair edge.
